product.name: Professional Pay-As-You-Use
product.shortDescription: Get all the private banking perks you deserve. A monthly maintenance fee applies, then only pay for the transactions you use.

productFeature.name: Credit card
value: R80 pm credit card service fee

productFeature.name: Overdraft
value: R49 pm for overdraft limits up to R10 000 or R69 pm for limits more than R10 000; and
a once-off initiation fee will be charged.

features.name: Cheque card
features.description: Linked to your current account, your cheque card includes travel,reward and lifestyle perks. Secondary cards are free

features.name: eNotes
features.description: SMS notifications to ensure you are informed of transactions on your account.

features.name: No Funds Alert Services
features.description: SMS notification to ensure you are informed should your account be low on funds.

features.name: Greenbacks Rewards Membership
features.description: Monthly subscription to the Greenbacks reward programme â€“ earn on swipes and redeem as cash, fees or get deals in app.
